extendedInfo.description: [1TouchMore] makes your phone quick and easy to use.[1Touchmore] is a stylish, elegant app that simplifies complicated processes when you make calls or send text messages. You can make calls and send text messages simply by one touch of the pre-defined event icons on your cell phoneâs home page. Not only does [1TouchMore] save you time, it increases your efficiency as well. [1TouchMore] is easy to use. It only takes a few simple steps to set up your frequently dialed numbers and text messages on your cell phone home page so that you can make calls or send out text message easily later on. [1TouchMore] is designed for single-handed manipulation; you can use it anywhere, anytime.With neat, personalized styled themes and well-designed user interfaces, [1TouchMore] brings you an effortless, straightforward, and expeditious user experience.ã [1TouchMore] key featuresãâPre-defined most frequently used phone numbers and text messages    [1TouchMore]âs well-designed user interfaces provide an effortless way for you to set up your most frequently used phone numbers and text messages on your cell phoneâs home page. You can dial the number or send out text message any time simply by one touch of the widget icon. It saves your valuable time by eliminating complicated, repetitive processes. It is so easy to use; you can be more focused on what you are dealing with when you are in a hurry.âReplace text in SMS for recipient    Introducing simple and personalized features for writing texts, you can insert replaceable content such as [last name], and [first name] for sending the same message to multiple contacts at the same time. [1TouchMore] will substitute the recipientâs last name and name for you.â[1TouchMore] widgetWith [1TouchMore] you can set up a widget on the home page. Making calls or sending texts will be as easy as one touch and done. âEvent status and history logEach event defined in [1TouchMore] has its own status. Red indicates canât make the call or the sent text message failed. Yellow means the text message has been sent out, but there is no response yet. Green means not only the call or the text message is put through, but the corresponding response is received. The app also keeps the event transmission history log so that you can check it any time. âElegant and personalized themes and styles    [1TouchMore] provides various themes and styles from which you can choose. We will provide enhanced functions in the future release so that you can design your own themes and styles used in your [1TouchMore].âSupport multiple languages    [1TouchMore] provides user interfaces and tutorials in English, Spanish, Simple Chinese, Traditional Chinese, and Japanese. More languages will be supported in the future releases.ãAbout our products and frequently asked questions (FAQ)ã     Please visit our web site (www.comm-ez.com) for more details about our products and services. You may find the reference documents and frequently asked questions (FAQ) in [1TouchMore] web pages very helpful.ãUser feedback and ratingã    Thank you for downloading and installing [1TouchMore] app on your cell phone. We do hope the app can make your life easier and simpler. We need your feedback so that we can continuously improve the functionalities of our product. Please visit our website and provide your comments. Your feedback will help us make this app more suitable for your use in our next revision. Your help is greatly appreciated.New features for version 1.5.11.Users can create their own message templates, which can be searched and browsed via message types and apply these templates when compiling new text messages.2.New widgets with more elegant and flexible designs.3.Option that allows the user to save contact information entered manually into his/her cell phoneâs contact list.4.Ability to preview the message before sending it out.5.New theme added: [Stylish Classic].

reviews.title: Excellant

reviews.title: Very bad app
reviews.comment: Used it 5 minuts and then deleted the app as it was impossible to understand how or what to use it for. Very poor interface
reviews.author: Paul Smith

reviews.title: Good app needs some work
reviews.comment: This is a good app but if it had a lock screen widget to use it without entering the lock screen password it would be much better! Truly 1 touch!
reviews.author: Terry Shilson

reviews.title: ok+
reviews.comment: Although I think there are other apps that are closer to what I wanted, this seems to work ok. Some feature requests though: 1. I want a 4x1 or 2x1 or even 1x1 widget (I need only one or two speeddials) 2. I want settings for the widgets. (like theme, and which events to show) 3. When I add an event with action type \"Make call\" and add Recipient, Description and Icon should be filled with info from the contact.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Love the app gives you options to text and call in one touch.  Widget is pretty nice too.  But would like to have an manual order selection for my contacts which contact is on top and on bottom.  Hopefully in next update you\'ll include this feature

reviews.title: I love it!
reviews.comment: The new theme for Christmas looks pretty, and the new function is really useful when sending greeting SMS to all friends and family. Saving me at least 2 hours for texting all my friends one by one.

reviews.title: Nothing special!!!
